org.apache.flink.runtime.managementgraph

Class ManagementGroupVertex

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.flink.runtime.managementgraph.ManagementAttachment
      • org.apache.flink.runtime.managementgraph.ManagementGroupVertex
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IOReadableWritable

    public final class ManagementGroupVertex
extends ManagementAttachment
implements IOReadableWritable
    This class implements a management group vertex of a ManagementGraph. A management group vertex is derived from the type of group vertices Nephele uses in its internal scheduling structures.

    This class is not thread-safe.

      • isInputVertex

        public boolean isInputVertex()
        Checks if this vertex is an input vertex in its stage, i.e. has either no incoming connections or only incoming connections to group vertices in a lower stage.
        Returns:
        true if this vertex is an input vertex, false otherwise

      • isOutputVertex

        public boolean isOutputVertex()
        Checks if this vertex is an output vertex in its stage, i.e. has either no outgoing connections or only outgoing connections to group vertices in a higher stage.
        Returns:
        true if this vertex is an output vertex, false otherwise

      • getSuccessors

        public List<ManagementGroupVertex> getSuccessors()
        Returns the list of successors of this group vertex. A successor is a group vertex which can be reached via a group edge originating at this group vertex.
        Returns:
        the list of successors of this group vertex.

      • getPredecessors

        public List<ManagementGroupVertex> getPredecessors()
        Returns the list of predecessors of this group vertex. A predecessors is a group vertex which can be reached via a group edge arriving at this group vertex.
        Returns:
        the list of predecessors of this group vertex.
